name: Paper Mate Clearpoint Mechanical Pencils, 0.7mm HB #2 Pencil Lead, Includes 2 Pencils, 1 Lead Refill, 2 Erasers - Back to School, Study Supplies, College, Note-Taking
short_description: Mechanical pencils create clear, precise lines every time
Side lead advance lets you load lead without losing your grasp
Range of colorful barrels add a dimension of fun
Soft grip design adds comfort and ease
Jumbo twist eraser makes erasing clean and easy
Includes two 0.7mm mechanical pencils, 2 erasers, and 1 lead refill set
product_description: Product Description With the feel of a pen and the look and performance of a pencil, Paper Mate Clearpoint Mechanical Pencils are the clear choice for smooth, easy writing. These pencils feature a convenient side-click advance mechanism on the barrel that advances the lead with just a click for uninterrupted performance. The textured grip provides comfort and control during long writing sessions, while the jumbo twist-up eraser lets you easily correct mistakes without any smudges or tearing. Finally, a wide range of fashion barrels keeps writing fun! Use these Paper Mate mechanical pencils as drafting pencils for clean, accurate lines or stock up for your school supplies so you never have to worry about a broken pencil tip. From the Manufacturer Mechanical pencil features a centrally located click-advance button that lets you easily advance the lead without releasing your hold of the pencil. Soft grip is designed for added comfort and ease. Jumbo twist-up eraser is larger than standard erasers and advances easily. Mechanical pencil is retractable to protect pockets and purses from damage. Refillable.

name: Zebra Pen DelGuard Lead Refills 0.5mm HB, Break-Resistant Graphite for Mechanical Pencils, Smooth Writing, Compatible with DelGuard Pencil, 1-Pack, 12 Lead Refills Included (89881)
short_description: Break-Resistant Graphite Design: Built for use with the DelGuard pencil system, this 0.5mm HB lead resists breaking under pressure—ideal for school, work, or precise technical writing
Smooth and Consistent Lines: Delivers clean, skip-free strokes that stay legible and sharp—great for planners, exams, journals, or professional drafting without smudging
Reliable Fine Point Performance: The 0.5mm size gives you the control needed for accurate writing or drawing, making it perfect for students, creatives, and professionals alike
Compatible with DelGuard Pencils: Designed to work seamlessly with Zebra’s DelGuard mechanical pencils to maintain optimal performance and reduce mid-task interruptions
Contains 12 Refills in a Compact Case: Includes 12 lead pieces in a slim case that fits easily in pencil pouches or desk drawers, so you always have durable refills within reach
product_description: Keep your writing sharp and frustration-free with Zebra Pen DelGuard Lead Refills. These 0.5mm HB graphite leads are engineered for break-resistant performance and are fully compatible with the Zebra DelGuard mechanical pencil system. Each 1-pack includes 12 lead refills stored in a convenient, portable case that’s easy to carry to school, work, or wherever inspiration strikes. Whether you're tackling class notes, technical sketches, or professional tasks, this refill pack keeps your writing smooth and uninterrupted.
